snippet: Outside the Confederations Cup final, police officers were using tear gas canisters and stun grenades. Still, FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, declared the tournament a success.
lead_paragraph: Outside the Confederations Cup final, police officers were using tear gas canisters and stun grenades. Still, FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, declared the tournament a success.

headline.main: Blatter Calls Confederations Cup a Success Despite Protests
